item.description: Hi all! Welcome to the first edition of {Tech & Dev}. item.title: 3 Ways To Learn Coding Within Three Months
item.description: If you desire to code but have no plan on how to get started then this article is for you. Desiring to code is one thing and being consistent about it is another thing. Most beginners give up when things start to go south. Welcome to anythingprogramming.com, in this article I will list some guides that will help you to stay on track without burning out. item.title: 1 line of code How to reverse all words of a string
item.description: 1 const reverseWords = (str) => str.split(" ").map((word) => [...word].reverse().join("")).join(""); Returns the string with all words reversed Improved version with unicode support 1 const reverseWords = (str) => str.replace(/(\p{L}+)/gu, (word) => [...word].reverse().join('')); The repository and npm package You can find the all the utility functions from this series at github.com/martinkr/onelinecode The library is also published to npm as @onelinecode for your convenience.

item.title: 1 line of code How to reverse a string
item.description: 1 const reverseString = str => [...str].reverse().join(""); Returns the reversed string.
